colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019A *, ,(ZHES GSANG CHEN LHA MO RIG BYED MA'I BSNYEN PA'I KHA SKONG DANG DBANG BSDUD KYI SBYIN BSREG BYA TSUL PHUN TSOGS DPAL STER ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GI GAM DU GNAS PA'I GSOL DPON TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSOS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG BYUNG NA KUN LA BLANG BDE BA'I 'BOG YOD ZHES BSKUL BAR, MKHAS MIN KYANG MKHAS PA'I TSANG KHA LOB BYED MKHAN SPRUL MING 'DZIN, ^YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG RGYAL MING CAN GYIS SGRIGS TE SUG BRIS BGYI BA'O, ,DGE'O, ,)
